May 28, 1887 D Alloa Contest
Alloa Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Alloa Contest alloa-contest
Alloa Park, Alloa, Clackmannanshire, Scotland, UK Source: The Dundee Courier & Argus (Dundee, Scotland), Monday, May 30, 1887; Issue 10572. A wind band contest was held before the brass band contest. Promoted by Alloa Instrumental Band 5 bands competed
Dec. 29, 2011, 5 p.m. May 10, 2019, 10:40 a.m.
1 Alva Volunteers James Jenkins

3 Alloa Colliery John McBeath
4 Tillicoultry James Jenkins
5 Galston A. Young
